definition: top (of the head)/apex/to fall forwards/inverted/to jolt

sentences.english: Our plane hobbled  through the cloud cluster.
sentences.chinese: 我們乘坐的飛機顛簸着穿過了那塊雲團。

sentences.english: Those metal utensils are jingling as the car bumps along.
sentences.chinese: 顛簸，那些金屬器皿在玎璫作響。

sentences.english: The old bus bumped along the mountain road.
sentences.chinese: 舊公共汽車沿著山路顛簸行駛。

sentences.english: The boat wallowed helplessly in the stormy sea.
sentences.chinese: 大海中無力地顛簸行駛。

sentences.english: When our plane landed in the storm, it hit the runway with a jolt.
sentences.chinese: 只是飛機降落時有些顛簸，空中有云，我想是這樣的。

sentences.english: The bad road bounced the old car .
sentences.chinese: 這條壞路使這臺舊車上下顛簸。

sentences.english: The wind tossed the boat in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 風使得那條船在海上來回顛簸。

sentences.english: The boat wallowed helplessly in the stormy sea.
sentences.chinese: 那艘船在波浪滔滔的大海中無力地顛簸行駛。

sentences.english: The cart jolted along the rough road.
sentences.chinese: 馬車在崎嶇不平的道路上顛簸行進。

sentences.english: The boat bobbed up and down in the water?
Improved player transitions and camera jolting when changing swimming direction.
sentences.chinese: 改進的球員轉換和顛簸時改變游泳方向的相機。

sentences.english: The jeep bucketed over the bumpy road.
sentences.chinese: 轎車在鄉間路上顛簸前進。

sentences.english: Fasten your seatbelts. It＇s going to be a bumpy night.
sentences.chinese: 繫緊你的安全帶，這將是一個顛簸的夜晚。

sentences.english: We gripped the sides of the boat as the waves tossed us about.
sentences.chinese: 那船顛簸得好厲害，我們只好緊握船舷。

sentences.english: The car bucketed down the road.
We are encountering some turbulence. Please return to your seats and fasten your seat belts.
sentences.chinese: 我們遇到顛簸，請回到您的座位坐好，繫好安全帶。

definition: to hasten on with one's journey/to hurry on
(saying) to be very scared and on edge
lit. breeze is still, waves are quiet (idiom); tranquil environment/all is quiet/a dead calm (at sea)
to thwart/to foil (sb's plans)/a setback/a failure/a defeat
to pass over mountains ridges (idiom); fig. hardships of the journey
to suffer untold hardships (idiom); trials and tribulations/with difficulty/after some effort
